mapper.select: SELECT r.recruit_title , r.recruit_apply_date , r.recruit_appr_status , u.user_id FROM recruit r JOIN user u ON r.user_code = u.user_code ORDER BY recruit_apply_date DESC

SELECT r.recruit_code , r.recruit_title , r.recruit_content , r.recruit_url , r.recruit_start , r.recruit_end , r.recruit_apply_date , r.recruit_appr_status , u.user_id FROM recruit r JOIN user u ON r.user_code = u.user_code WHERE r.recruit_code = #{ recruitCode };
